comments:
In M7 with new look jars installed I ran the RCP tutorial part 2 example 
(http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/index.cgi/%7Echeckout%7E/platform-ui-home/rcp-
proposal/rcp_tutorial/tutorial2.html). Then I double-clicked in the open blank 
window and got this crash:
